text: Q. 49 Which of the following statements is true? e An advantage of aging is to solve starvation problem. Your option is Correct Round-Robin scheduling algorithm will always result in better output compared to FCFS algorithm. @ User level threads scheduling is faster than Kernel level thread scheduling. Your option is Correct An advantage of system call is to provide an interface between running program and the OS. Your option is Correct VIEW Anwser || COPY || MARK
